text: Bill Eldridge was an Australian producer. He worked at ABC radio as an actor and producer. He also produced some early TV plays such as Roundabout. ==Select Credits== *Candida (1951) - radio play - actor *Deadly Nightshade (1954) - actor *Camera Club (1957) *Roundabout (1957) - director *Symphonie Pastorale (1958) - director *Seeing Stars (1958) - TV variety show - director *They Found a Cave (1962) - writer ==References== ==External links== *Bill Eldridge at IMDb Category:Australian television producers
title: Bill Eldridge
